author: TravisEz13
body:
Address part of #2393 
Package is available for testing: https://github.com/TravisEz13/PowerShell/releases/download/v6.0.0-alpha.17/powershell-6.0.0_alpha.9_893_gcd2d3ea-1.suse.42.1.x86_64.rpm
Docker image `travisez13/powershell:opensuse42.1` is available for testing
cc @PowerShell/area-build
title: Add build support for OpenSUSE 42.1
